original: 大量增加武將攻擊時造成致命一擊的機率。同時大量提高武將的閃避率。戰鬥中武將會定期恢復少量體力。
text: A large increase in the probability of a critical strike when the generals attack. At the same time, the dodge rate of the generals is greatly increased. During the battle, the military will regularly recover a small amount of physical strength.
